content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • Construction of a three-storey podium block comprising retail, community club and bus interchange with two basements and mezzanine of retail and carparks, and 10 storey residential development above.
  • The residential development with 12 blocks and 920 residential units includes a clubhouse, swimming pool and communal facilities. The contract also includes associated works such as the construction of a town plaza, and connection to the existing Yishun MRT station via a new Underground Pedestrian Network.
CLIENT

North Gem Development Pte Ltd and FC North Gem Trustee Pte Ltd as trustee-manager of North Gem Trust

LOCATION

Yishun Central 1 / Yishun Avenue 2

COMPLETION YEAR

2018

AWARDS
  • BCA Construction Excellence Award, Commercial/Mixed Development Buildings Category – Excellence 2020
  • WSH Performance (SHARP) Award 2019
  • BCA BIM Awards 2017 (Projects Category – GoldPlus)
